entry.title: The Daily Disasters of Eddie Diaz's Gay Yoda
entry.summary:
Author: Beaufoy14

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,255Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 1

Summary: Some are born saints, some become saints, and some have sainthood horribly thrust upon them by two beefy firefights who are unable to communicate their feelings to each other in healthy or normal ways. Georgie Abbott isn't sure what she's done to deserve this cruel and unusual punishment, but when Eddie Diaz decides that she's the only person on the planet who can help him through a looming sexuality crisis, by god she's going to take the job seriously.An outsider POV of our two favorite firefighters; featuring couscous confessions, Dirty Dancing lifts, Eddie being an absolute disaster, and a teeny tiny pony called Peanut.

What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 311,140Chapters: 32/55Kudos: 332

Summary: ‚ÄúDoes this change a thing between us?‚Äù Buck asks, his voice low, his hands still framing Eddie‚Äôs face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie‚Äôs lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck‚Äôs mouth like it‚Äôs the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie‚Äôs fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know.‚Äù It‚Äôs not a yes‚ÄîBuck‚Äôs not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it‚Äôs so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. ‚ÄúAlright,‚Äù Buck exhales, nodding like it‚Äôs nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie‚Äôs mouth in his again. The soft, desperate sound Eddie lets out‚Äîlike relief and need tangled together‚Äîhits Buck like a punch to the chest. or; Eddie‚Äôs shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior‚Ä¶ or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,626Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 66

Summary: "Heading to the collapse site to find Buckley." "Diaz, I said to regroup," Gerrard states firmly. "All the disrespect in the world to you, I don't actually work for you and I'm not leaving Buck alone," Eddie heads down to the street level with Ravi on his tail. A canon divergence of sorts - Buck doesn't find out about Eddie's job offer before their shift. He finds out about it on shift right before the building collapse in Seismic Shifts; and because Buck has such great luck, he proceeds to get trapped in the building. entry.title: to catch a catfish
entry.summary:
Author: humandevolution

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,675Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 121

Summary: "Was this...recent?""Um...sort of? Within the last six months. W-why?"Taylor stares blankly into the distance for a moment, before her face does this thing that Buck knows can only mean she is angry or fueled by righteous fury."He's still on Tinder," she declares, point blank, and pulls her phone out of her pocket. She flicks through a couple things, and then she's turning it to Buck.OR - Buck encounters Taylor Kelly in the wild one night, and she's surprised to hear he's dating Eddie, since she saw him on Tinder last night. They concoct a plan to catch him in the act.

Summary: Buck hears Eddie walking back toward them and turns to ask if the movie they‚Äôve landed on sounds okay, but his voice gets caught in his throat when he sees what he‚Äôs put on. Eddie‚Äôs still wearing the same t-shirt and jeans he‚Äôs been wearing all day, but draped over his shoulders is Buck‚Äôs fluffy, baby pink sweater. It hangs loosely off of Eddie‚Äôs frame, clearly at least a size or two too big. The sleeves are also far too long, extending past his fingertips. And it‚Ä¶does something to Buck. ‚ÄúHi,‚Äù he chokes out lamely, all other words escaping him as his brain continues to short-circuit. ‚ÄúHi,‚Äù Eddie replies with a smile as he plops down in the open space on the couch. or; Eddie starts wearing Buck's sweaters, especially his pink one, and Buck loses his mind about it. entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,055Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Evan is Bobby‚Äôs biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.
